version_description: minor fixes

Thank you for learning with Khan Academy Kids! This release includes iPhone X optimization and bug fixes. We value your input, so please continue to reach out at khankids@khanacademy.org. Happy learning!

Thanks for learning with Khan Kids! In this latest version, Kodi the bear and her friends added a fun welcome video. They can't wait to share it with you! We value your input, so please continue to reach out at khankids@khanacademy.org. Happy learning!

Thank you for playing with Kodi and friends! We’re excited to share that Khan Kids has won several awards! These include the Parents' Choice Gold Award, 5 stars from Common Sense Media, and Editor’s Choice Award from Children’s Technology Review. Cool bea

Trick or treat! We're so excited to show you our new haunted house and fun costumes! We also have some brand new Halloween activities for you in the library. As always, you can reach us at khankids@khanacademy.org. Happy Halloween!

Thanks for learning with Kodi and friends! We made a few improvements to Khan Academy Kids so we can keep having fun in the Kids' Club. Cool beans! We love hearing from you, so get in touch at khankids@khanacademy.org

Check out the fresh snow at the Kids’ Club! Kodi and friends are all bundled up and ready to play. Grab your sled, and come see our new winter activities in the library. You can reach us at khankids@khanacademy.org. From the tip of your nose, down to your

A new shipment of National Geographic Young Explorer articles just arrived at the Kids' Club. Check them out in the Library! We'd love to hear what you think at khankids@khanacademy.org. Happy learning!

Winter has arrived at the Kids' Club! Update Khan Academy Kids today for new seasonal content including:
- Festive videos from Super Simple Songs
- Snowy math and reading activities
- Joyful coloring pages and fun stickers

Kodi and her friends are counting down to back-to-school with this latest update to Khan Academy Kids!

Check out all-new content:
- 10 interactive number books featuring Kodi and friends
- 10 back-to-school themed coloring pages
- 5 t

In the latest update, we fixed some bugs and made some minor updates. Please update your app for the best learning experience.

If you have any feedback, please contact us at khankids@khanacademy.org.

With the latest update to Khan Academy Kids, Kodi and friends are ready for summer learning and fun!  And just in time for summer travel, we’ve launched Kodi’s Suitcase - a collection of books and learning activities in the app that are available offline.

Happy Valentine's Day from Kodi and friends! Love isn't all that's in the air this season - we have some brand new books in the library that explore all kinds of emotions. Let us know what you think at khankids@khanacademy.org.

Kodi and her friends are ready to march into spring and can't wait to keep learning with you. We're happy to announce that you can now see your learning progress across iOS devices! Thank you for all your feedback helping us enable this feature. We'd love

Kodi and friends are excited to celebrate their favorite planet, Earth! Join them in the Kids' Club Library as they learn from 20 new Earth Day books from National Geographic and Bellwether Media. Be sure to check out all the new learning activities too!

With the latest update to Khan Academy Kids, Kodi and friends are ready for summer learning and fun!  And just in time for summer travel, we’ve launched Kodi’s Suitcase - a collection of books and learning activities in the app that are available offline.

NEW Teacher Tools that can support remote learning
• Set up your class easily
• Sign in with class codes
• Search lessons by CCSS and HeadStart standards, for Preschool through Grade 1
• Assign lessons to students
• View reports to monitor
